resume_sections.summary: Data engineer with experience building ETL pipelines and working with SQL databases. Proficient in data transformation, database optimization, and analytics-focused development. Strong foundation in relational databases and data-driven problem solving.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Integrated SQL database for transaction tracking and persistence
Built real-time delivery tracking using JavaScript, WebSockets, and SQL
Worked with relational databases using primary key-based data modeling
Optimized database queries for performance and scalability

education: Master's in Computer Science, University of Alabama at Birmingham, USA (Jan 2023 – Apr 2025) — GPA: 3.30/4.00
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science, Jain University, Bangalore, India (Jan 2019 – Jul 2022) — CGPA: 7.89/10
Key Subjects: Data Science, Database Systems, Machine Learning
